CustomField.description: Select a From email address to use for Survey Notification Email Alerts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Choose the email address to be used as the "From" address for Survey Notification Emails. This setting allows you to specify the sender's email address for a personalized and recognizable email communication experience. You can select a previously configured org-wide email address or choose "Current user's Email Address" to use the email associated with the user initiating the email. Additional org-wide email addresses can be configured in Salesforce setup to provide more options for sender addresses.
CustomField.label: Sender Email Address
